mixtral-8x7b_direct_sole-planning_result:
Day 1 - March 5, 2022: Arrival in Pittsburgh
- Group check-in at Sheraton Pittsburgh Hotel at Station Square (4-star hotel, $237 per night for a family room that sleeps 7)
- Rest and explore the area around the hotel

Day 2 - March 6, 2022: Exploring Pittsburgh
- Visit attractions such as the Duquesne Incline, Phipps Conservatory, and Children's Museum of Pittsburgh
- Lunch at Primanti Bros. ($30 for a family of 7)
- Dinner at The Capital Grille ($150 for a family of 7)

Day 3 - March 7, 2022: Traveling from Pittsburgh to Houston and Dallas
- Flight from Pittsburgh to Houston (e.g., F3660424, $389 per person, $2,723 total for the group of 7)
- Self-driving from Houston to Dallas (duration: 3 hours 27 mins, distance: 385 km, cost: $19 per car, around $133 for a group of 7)
- Accommodation in Dallas: Holiday Inn Express & Suites Dallas Market Center (3-star hotel, $160 per night for a family room that sleeps 7)

Day 4 - March 8, 2022: Exploring Dallas
- Visit attractions such as the Perot Museum of Nature and Science, Reunion Tower, and Dallas World Aquarium
- Lunch at The Slow Bone ($50 for a family of 7)
- Dinner at Pappas Bros. Steakhouse ($180 for a family of 7)

Day 5 - March 9, 2022: Traveling from Dallas to Pittsburgh
- Flight from Dallas to Pittsburgh (e.g., F3673723, $461 per person, $3,227 total for the group of 7)
- Total estimated cost: $15,889

This itinerary keeps you under budget and includes stops in Houston and Dallas while also catering to the needs of a family with young children.
